indicator_definition: Percentage of operational streetlights over total installed.
notes: Feeds energy dashboard and uptime policy monitor.

indicator_definition: Average time between emergency call receipt and arrival on scene.
Percentage accuracy of reported parking occupancy compared with audit samples.
Percentage of hourly AQI readings within WHO safe threshold over total readings.
data_quality_checks: no missing hours; aqi_value in [0,500]; threshold_flag?{0,1}
notes: Derived from IoT air-quality sensors; reported in Smart Environment Dashboard.
